MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD7 area of Selkirk, affecting properties in Viewfield Park and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2:26PM on Monday, 15 March 2021.
